metadata.feature_description: Search pages with multiple filters including page type, tags, publish status, date range, and workflow

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Content > Pages and open Page Search Results panel
steps.expected: Page Search Results panel opens with Advanced Filters visible
steps.actual: Page Search Results panel opened showing 41 pages with Advanced Filters section

steps.action: Click on Filter by Page Type dropdown and select Standard
steps.expected: Dropdown shows page type options including Standard, Existing, URL, File
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed all page type options: None, Standard, Existing, URL, File

steps.action: Select Standard type and click Apply
steps.expected: Results filtered to show only Standard page types
steps.actual: Results showed 41 pages with Standard page type, filter working correctly

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search by page type (URL) - No results

steps.action: Select URL page type from the dropdown and apply filter
steps.expected: Results filtered to show only URL page types or no results if none exist
steps.actual: Result showed 'NO PAGE FOUND' indicating no pages with URL type exist

steps.action: Click on Filter by Publish Status dropdown
steps.actual: Dropdown showed options: None, Published, Draft

steps.action: Select Draft status and apply filter
steps.expected: Results filtered to show only pages with Draft status
steps.actual: Results showed 10 pages with Draft publish status

steps.action: Click on Filter by Workflow dropdown
steps.actual: Dropdown showed workflows: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow

steps.action: Select Content Approval workflow and apply filter
steps.expected: Results filtered to show only pages using Content Approval workflow
steps.actual: Results showed 1 page (Workflow Test Page) with Content Approval workflow

steps.action: Select Page Type = Standard AND Publish Status = Draft, then click Apply
steps.expected: Results filtered using both criteria combined
steps.actual: Results showed 13 pages matching both Standard type AND Draft status

steps.action: Enter 'test' in the Tag filter input field and click Apply
steps.expected: Results filtered by tag, showing pages with matching tag or no results
steps.actual: Tag filter accepted input, displayed as chip with 'x' button. Result showed 'NO PAGE FOUND' as no pages have 'test' tag assigned

steps.action: Click on Filter by Published Date Range calendar icon
steps.expected: Date picker opens with two calendars for start and end dates
steps.actual: Date picker opened showing two February 2026 calendars with Clear and Apply buttons

steps.expected: Results filtered to show only pages published within the date range
steps.actual: Results showed 31 pages published between Feb 1-10, 2026 (down from 44)

steps.action: Clear all filters to show all pages and examine results area
steps.expected: Pagination controls visible if results exceed page size
steps.actual: Interface shows 50 pages in a scrollable list without traditional pagination controls. The system uses infinite scroll/virtual scroll approach
All pages visible by scrolling through the list - shows pages like Activity Feed, My Profile, Friends, Messages, Community, Blogs, etc.

steps.action: Enter non-existent search term 'xyznonexistentpage123' in search box and press Enter
steps.actual: Search executed and displayed 'NO PAGE FOUND.' message appropriately

observations: The page search interface uses a scrollable list instead of traditional pagination controls. All results are loaded and displayed in a virtual scroll container.
No pages in the test environment have tags assigned, so tag filtering test could only verify empty results behavior.
The Advanced Filters panel provides comprehensive filtering options: Page Type, Publish Status, Date Range, Workflow, and Tags.
Filter combinations work correctly - applying multiple filters produces intersection of results.
Clear button successfully resets all filters to default state.
